title: Kumbakona Kozhundhu Vethalaiya Lyrics Album
stanzas:
kumbakona kozhundhu
veththalaiya enna
killi paakkuriye.
vetkathula
veththala sevakkuthe

pattukota paakku
maathathaan enna
ponnu ketkuriye
padakkunnu nenjam
thudikkuthe

enna molam poda
neethaane eppo vaara
enna muzhusaave
appodhe naanum thaaren.

andha modho rathiri
siva raathiri
maharaasiyum
orumaadhiri
ada idhu idhu
ennaiku varradhu
kadhavellam thorandhu
naan kaathiruppen

kumbakona kozhundhu
veththalaiya enna
killi paakkuriye.
vetkathula
veththala sevakkuthe

pattukota paakku
maathathaan enna
ponnu ketkuriye
padakkunnu nenjam
thudikkuthe

thinnaiyila
oru naalum maama ma
unna thaniyaave
vidamaaten aamaa aamaa

methaiyila
oru naalum maama maama
unna thirudaama
vidamaatten aamaa aamaa

idha sirukki magala
irukki anaikka
enakku mattum
urimai irukku
karuppi mugaththa
sevakka vaikka
aasa enakku.(2)

andha modho rathiri
siva raathiri
maharaasiyum
orumaadhiri
ada idhu idhu
ennaiku varradhu
kadhavellam thorandhu
naan kaathiruppen

kumbakona kozhundhu
veththalaiya enna
killi paakkuriye.
vetkathula
veththala sevakkuthe

pattukota paakku
maathathaan enna
ponnu ketkuriye
padakkunnu nenjam
thudikkuthe

machathaiyum enni
paarka marakkaadh maama
mutha kadha onnum
solli tharanum aama aamaa

kattipudi vaithiyamum
kathukanum maamaa
nee kandapadi
kathu tharanum aamaa aamaa

indha odambu kodhichu
manasu elachi
unakkunu thaan
kaaththu kedakku
karuppan nenappu
kalanji kedakku
vaa vaa adhukku. (2)

andha modho rathiri
siva raathiri
maharaasiyum
orumaadhiri
ada idhu idhu
ennaiku varradhu
kadhavellam thorandhu
naan kaathiruppen

kumbakona kozhundhu
veththalaiya enna
killi paakkuriye.
vetkathula
veththala sevakkuthe

pattukota paakku
maathathaan enna
ponnu ketkuriye
padakkunnu nenjam
thudikkuthe

enna molam poda
neethaane eppo vaara
enna muzhusaave
appodhe naanum thaaren. (2)

andha modho rathiri
siva raathiri
maharaasiyum
orumaadhiri
ada idhu idhu
ennaiku varradhu
kadhavellam thorandhu
naan kaathiruppen

kumbakona kozhundhu
veththalaiya enna
killi paakkuriye.
vetkathula
veththala sevakkuthe
